BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_PAYFIXATION_DTL T (T.STR_EMP_NUMBER, T.NUM_SL_NO, T.STR_REASON_FOR_PAYFIX, T.STR_FILE_NO, T.STR_ORDER_NUMBER, T.DT_ORDER_DATE, T.PCH_PENALTY_IGNORED, T.PCH_PRESON_PAY_ABSORB, T.STR_ISSUING_AUTHORITY, T.STR_REMARKS_PAYFIX, T.NUM_PAYSCALE_TYPE, T.NUM_OLD_PAY_ID, T.NUM_OLD_BASIC_PAY, T.NUM_NEW_PAY_ID, T.NUM_NEW_BASIC_PAY, T.DT_EFFECT_DATE, T.DT_NEXT_INC_DATE, T.STR_REMARKS_FINANCE, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE, T.GNUM_ISVALID, T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_EMP_CUR_DETAIL_DTL T SET T.STR_EMP_NO=?, T.NUM_PAY_ATTRI_CODE=?, T.NUM_PAY_ID=?, T.DT_PAY_EFF_DATE=?, T.NUM_CUR_BASIC_PAY=?, T.DT_BASIC_EFF_DATE=?, T.STR_EVENT_CODE=?, T.DT_EVENT_DATE=?, T.DT_NEXT_INC_DATE=? WHERE T.STR_EMP_NO=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_EMP_PAYFIXATION_DTL T SET T.STR_EMP_NUMBER=?, T.NUM_SL_NO=?, T.STR_REASON_FOR_PAYFIX=?, T.STR_FILE_NO=?, T.STR_ORDER_NUMBER=?, T.DT_ORDER_DATE=?, T.PCH_PENALTY_IGNORED=?, T.PCH_PRESON_PAY_ABSORB=?, T.STR_ISSUING_AUTHORITY=?, T.STR_REMARKS_PAYFIX=?, T.NUM_PAYSCALE_TYPE=?, T.NUM_OLD_PAY_ID=?, T.NUM_OLD_BASIC_PAY=?, T.NUM_NEW_PAY_ID=?, T.NUM_NEW_BASIC_PAY=?, T.DT_EFFECT_DATE=?, T.DT_NEXT_INC_DATE=?, T.STR_REMARKS_FINANCE=?, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, T.GNUM_ISVALID=?, T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? ,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE T.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? AND T.NUM_SL_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_EMP_PAYFIXATION_DTL T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? AND T.NUM_SL_NO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
